name: UIKit
description: pure, accessible elements for use in React projects
author: Evan Jacobs <evan.jacobs@enigma.io>

scripts.build: browserify `cat package.json | jsawk 'return "-r " + Object.keys(this.browser).join(" -r ")' | awk '{$1=""; print $0}'` --debug --no-bundle-external --extension=.jsx | exorcist build/js/bundle.js.map > build/js/bundle.js
scripts.start: watchify `cat package.json | jsawk 'return "-r " + Object.keys(this.browser).join(" -r ")' | awk '{$1=""; print $0}'` --debug --no-bundle-external --extension=.jsx -o 'exorcist build/js/bundle.js.map > build/js/bundle.js'
scripts.release: NODE_ENV=production browserify `cat package.json | jsawk 'return "-r " + Object.keys(this.browser).join(" -r ")' | awk '{$1=""; print $0}'` --no-bundle-external --extension=.jsx | uglifyjs -mc drop_console > build/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.docs: mkdir -p docs/api && find . -type f -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' | grep -v '\./\(node_modules\|docs\|build\)' | xargs jsdoc -d docs/api -c docs/jsdoc.json
